mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FIN_Refund WHERE Deleted = 0 AND OrderNo = #{orderNo} DESC BY ID
SELECT * FROM FIN_Refund WHERE Deleted = 0 AND RefundNo = #{refundNo} DESC BY ID LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FIN_Refund (RefundNo, OrderNo, RefundFee, Reason, RefundID, State, Deleted, CreateTime, UpdateTime) VALUES (#{refundNo}, #{orderNo}, #{refundFee}, #{reason}, NULL, 0, 0, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE FIN_Refund SET RefundID = #{refundId}, State = 1, UpdateTime = NOW() WHERE RefundNo = #{refundNo} AND State = 0 AND Deleted = 0
UPDATE FIN_Refund SET State = #{state}, RefundTime = #{refundTime}, UpdateTime = NOW() WHERE RefundNo = #{refundNo} AND State = 1 AND Deleted = 0
